info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 4:14PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Cabarrus, east central Mecklenburg and northeastern Union Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 413 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles south of Downtown Concord, or 4 miles northwest of Midland, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Midland, Mint Hill, Fairview In Union County, Harrisburg, Mt Pleasant and New Salem. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
